title: SC overrules Bombay HC on jurisdiction of special courts in bankruptcy cases
description: The Supreme Court has clarified that special courts presided by a sessions or additional sessions judge can try complaints under the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code 2016. The court set aside a Bombay High Court's decision that only special courts consisting of a metropolitan or judicial magistrate (JM) were empowered to hear complaints under the bankruptcy law.
